blockquote

Colors

"Perfect typography is the most elusive of all arts."

Jan Tschichold

"Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler."

Albert Einstein

"Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life."

Mark Twain

"Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws."

Plato

"When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us."

Helen Keller

"Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly."

John F. Kennedy

"Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people."

Eleanor Roosevelt
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote>
            <p>"Perfect typography is the most elusive of all arts."</p>
            <cite>Jan Tschichold</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--blue">
            <p>"Everything should be made as simple as possible, but not simpler."</p>
            <cite>Albert Einstein</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--indigo">
            <p>"Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life."</p>
            <cite>Mark Twain</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--success">
            <p>"Good people do not need laws to tell them to act responsibly, while bad people will find a way around the laws."</p>
            <cite>Plato</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--danger">
            <p>"When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us."</p>
            <cite>Helen Keller</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--info">
            <p>"Those who dare to fail miserably can achieve greatly."</p>
            <cite>John F. Kennedy</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--warning">
            <p>"Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people."</p>
            <cite>Eleanor Roosevelt</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
</div>

Alignment

"I have come to believe that the whole world is an enigma, a harmless enigma that is made terrible by our own mad attempt to interpret it as though it had an underlying truth."

Umberto Eco

"Be nice to people on your way up because you meet them on your way down."

Jimmy Durante

"In science one tries to tell people, in such a way as to be understood by everyone, something that no one ever knew before. But in poetry, it's the exact opposite."

Paul Dirac
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--blue">
            <p>"I have come to believe that the whole world is an enigma, a harmless enigma that is made terrible by our own mad attempt to interpret it as though it had an underlying truth."</p>
            <cite>Umberto Eco</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--blue blockquote--center">
            <p>"Be nice to people on your way up because you meet them on your way down."</p>
            <cite>Jimmy Durante</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--blue blockquote--right">
            <p>"In science one tries to tell people, in such a way as to be understood by everyone, something that no one ever knew before. But in poetry, it's the exact opposite."</p>
            <cite>Paul Dirac</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
</div>

Spacing

"There is a wisdom of the head, and a wisdom of the heart."

Charles Dickens

"You are remembered for the rules you break."

Douglas MacArthur

"Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them."

A. A. Milne
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--compressed blockquote--blue">
            <p>"There is a wisdom of the head, and a wisdom of the heart."</p>
            <cite>Charles Dickens</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--blue">
            <p>"You are remembered for the rules you break."</p>
            <cite>Douglas MacArthur</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <blockquote class="blockquote--loose blockquote--blue">
            <p>"Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them."</p>
            <cite>A. A. Milne</cite>
        </blockquote>
    </div>
</div>

button

Sketch

Size

View code
Copy code 
<button class="btn btn--small">Small</button>
<button class="btn">Default</button>
<button class="btn btn--wide">Wide</button>

Color

View code
Copy code 
<button class="btn">Default</button>
<button class="btn btn--primary">Primary</button>
<button class="btn btn--secondary">Secondary</button>
<button class="btn btn--negative">Negative</button>
<button class="btn btn--success">Success</button>
<button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Gray Ghost</button>
<button class="btn btn--white">White</button>
<button class="btn btn--white-ghost">White Ghost</button>

Disabled

View code
Copy code 
<button class="btn disabled">Default</button>
<button class="btn btn--primary disabled">Primary</button>
<button class="btn btn--secondary disabled">Secondary</button>
<button class="btn btn--negative disabled">Negative</button>
<button class="btn btn--success disabled">Success</button>
<button class="btn btn--gray-ghost disabled">Gray Ghost</button>
<button class="btn btn--white disabled">White</button>
<button class="btn btn--white-ghost disabled">White Ghost</button>

Allowed Backgrounds

Use this guide to determine which buttons can be used on which backgrounds.

White BG








Light Gray BG








Medium Gray BG







Dark Gray BG




Blue BG



Vibrant Blue BG




Indigo BG




View code
Copy code 
<div class="row no-gutters">
    <div class="col-md-3 panel panel--bordered text-center">
       <h3>White BG</h3><br>
       <div><button class="btn">Default</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--primary">Primary</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--secondary">Secondary</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--negative">Negative</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--success">Success</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Gray Ghost</button></div><br>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3 panel panel--ltgray text-center">
       <h3>Light Gray BG</h3><br>
       <div><button class="btn">Default</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--primary">Primary</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--secondary">Secondary</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--negative">Negative</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--success">Success</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Gray Ghost</button></div><br>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3 panel panel--mdgray text-center">
       <h3>Medium Gray BG</h3><br>
       <div><button class="btn">Default</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--primary">Primary</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--secondary">Secondary</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--negative">Negative</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--success">Success</button></div><br>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3 panel panel--dkgray text-center">
       <h3>Dark Gray BG</h3><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--white">White</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--white-ghost">White Ghost</button></div><br>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3 panel panel--blue text-center">
       <h3>Blue BG</h3><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--white">White</button></div><br>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3 panel panel--vibblue text-center">
       <h3>Vibrant Blue BG</h3><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--white">White</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--white-ghost">White Ghost</button></div><br>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3 panel panel--indigo text-center">
       <h3>Indigo BG</h3><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--white">White</button></div><br>
       <div><button class="btn btn--white-ghost">White Ghost</button></div><br>
    </div>
</div>

Button Icons

Small

Default

Large
View code
Copy code 
<h6>Small</h6>
<div class="base-margin-top">
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--small"><span class="icon-tools"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--small btn--primary"><span class="icon-bookmark"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--small btn--secondary"><span class="icon-analysis"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--small btn--negative"><span class="icon-power"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--small btn--success"><span class="icon-check"></span></button>
</div>
<br>
<h6>Default</h6>
<div class="base-margin-top">
    <button class="btn btn--icon"><span class="icon-tools"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--primary"><span class="icon-bookmark"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--secondary"><span class="icon-analysis"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--negative"><span class="icon-power"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--success"><span class="icon-check"></span></button>
</div>
<br>
<h6>Large</h6>
<div class="base-margin-top">
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--large"><span class="icon-tools"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--large btn--primary"><span class="icon-bookmark"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--large btn--secondary"><span class="icon-analysis"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--large btn--negative"><span class="icon-power"></span></button>
    <button class="btn btn--icon btn--large btn--success"><span class="icon-check"></span></button>
</div>

Button Groups

Wrap buttons in a btn-group container to create segmented button controls.
Add the class selected to indicate the selected option.
Add the class disabled to indicate a disabled option.
Small
Default
Squared
Wide
With Divider
View code
Copy code 
<h6 class="section">Small</h6>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost selected">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost selected">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-edit"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-transcript"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost selected">
                <span class="icon-text-size"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-zoom-in"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-zoom-out"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-edit"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-transcript"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-text-size"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost selected">
                <span class="icon-zoom-in"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--small btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-zoom-out"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<h6 class="section">Default</h6>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost selected">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost selected">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-edit"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-transcript"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost selected">
                <span class="icon-text-size"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-zoom-in"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-zoom-out"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group">
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-edit"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-transcript"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-text-size"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost selected">
                <span class="icon-zoom-in"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-zoom-out"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<h6 class="section">Squared</h6>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group btn-group--square">
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost selected">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost disabled">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group btn-group--square">
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost selected">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost disabled">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group btn-group--square">
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-edit"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-transcript"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost selected">
                <span class="icon-text-size"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost disabled">
                <span class="icon-zoom-in"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">
                <span class="icon-zoom-out"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="btn-group btn-group--square">
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-edit"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-transcript"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">
                <span class="icon-text-size"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost selected">
                <span class="icon-zoom-in"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost disabled">
                <span class="icon-zoom-out"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<h6 class="section">Wide</h6>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="btn-group btn-group--wide">
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost selected">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost disabled">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="btn-group btn-group--wide">
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">One</button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost selected">Two</button>
            <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost disabled">Three</button>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<h6 class="section">With Divider</h6>
<div class="btn-group btn-group--divider btn-group--wide">
    <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost selected">One</button>
    <button class="btn btn--primary-ghost">Two</button>
</div>
<div class="section">
    <div class="btn-group btn-group--divider btn-group--wide">
        <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost selected">One</button>
        <button class="btn btn--gray-ghost">Two</button>
    </div>
</div>

checkbox

Sketch

States

 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel">
    <div class="container-fluid">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Normal</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Hover</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Pressed</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Focus</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Disabled</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">ON</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="active hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="focus">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox disabled">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="active hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="focus">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox disabled">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

Layout

Checkbox elements are stacked by default. Add the form group modifier form-group--inline to align them horizontally.
Stacked (default)
Inline
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Stacked (default)</div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
               <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Inline</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Spacing

Wrap your checkbox elements in a form-group to control spacing. This applies to both inline and stacked checkbox elements.
Compressed
Regular (default)
Loose
None
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row no-gutters">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Compressed</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <hr>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Regular (default)</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Two</span>

Allowed Backgrounds

Checkboxes are only allowed on the following panels.
WHITE
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
LIGHT GRAY
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
DARK GRAY
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
INDIGO
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
GREEN
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
BLUE
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel">
    <div class="container-fluid">
    <h6>WHITE</h6>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Normal</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Hover</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Pressed</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Focus</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Disabled</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">ON</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="active hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="focus">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox disabled">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="active hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="focus">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox disabled">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="active hover">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" class="focus">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="checkbox disabled">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

Examples

Be Positive

Use positive and active wording for checkbox labels, so that it’s perfectly clear what will happen if the user turns on the checkbox. Avoid negations such as “Don’t send me notifications” which would mean that the user would have to check the box in order for something not to happen.

Label Wrapping

By default, checkbox labels are wrapped. You can prevent wrapping by adding the modifier checkbox--nowrap. We recommend that you set the checkbox title attribute to the full label text when wrapping is disabled.

Switch versus Checkbox

For a binary choice, the main difference between a switch and a checkbox is that the checkbox is for status and the switch is for action.

In the example below, the use of a switch is more clear than the use of a checkbox to turn the WiFi on.
WiFi
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <h2 class="section">Be Positive</h2>
        <blockquote class="base-margin-bottom">Use positive and active wording for checkbox labels, so that it’s perfectly clear what will happen if the user turns on the checkbox. Avoid negations such as “Don’t send me notifications” which would mean that the user would have to check the box in order for something not to happen.</blockquote>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Enable IP Routing</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Activate Feature</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Install License</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <h2 class="section">Label Wrapping</h2>
        <blockquote class="base-margin-bottom">By default, checkbox labels are wrapped. You can prevent wrapping by adding the modifier <i>checkbox--nowrap</i>. We recommend that you set the checkbox title attribute to the full label text when wrapping is disabled.</blockquote>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Wrapped. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum leo turpis, lacinia et sem sed, luctus molestie nisi. Vestibulum dignissim scelerisque scelerisque. Nunc sagittis felis sem. Curabitur scelerisque erat eget fermentum suscipit. Phasellus venenatis sed leo ut luctus. Fusce sagittis risus et eleifend eleifend. Quisque vitae enim fermentum mauris interdum maximus. Vestibulum hendrerit augue eget mattis semper. Aliquam laoreet sem quis felis aliquam luctus. Phasellus congue, tellus ornare iaculis viverra, quam diam fringilla lacus, non finibus turpis metus eu risus.</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="checkbox checkbox--nowrap" title="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum leo turpis, lacinia et sem sed, luctus molestie nisi. Vestibulum dignissim scelerisque scelerisque. Nunc sagittis felis sem. Curabitur scelerisque erat eget fermentum suscipit. Phasellus venenatis sed leo ut luctus. Fusce sagittis risus et eleifend eleifend. Quisque vitae enim fermentum mauris interdum maximus. Vestibulum hendrerit augue eget mattis semper. Aliquam laoreet sem quis felis aliquam luctus. Phasellus congue, tellus ornare iaculis viverra, quam diam fringilla lacus, non finibus turpis metus eu risus.">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">Unwrapped. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum leo turpis, lacinia et sem sed, luctus molestie nisi. Vestibulum dignissim scelerisque scelerisque. Nunc sagittis felis sem. Curabitur scelerisque erat eget fermentum suscipit. Phasellus venenatis sed leo ut luctus. Fusce sagittis risus et eleifend eleifend. Quisque vitae enim fermentum mauris interdum maximus. Vestibulum hendrerit augue eget mattis semper. Aliquam laoreet sem quis felis aliquam luctus. Phasellus congue, tellus ornare iaculis viverra, quam diam fringilla lacus, non finibus turpis metus eu risus.</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <h2 class="section">Switch versus Checkbox</h2>
        <blockquote class="base-margin-bottom">For a binary choice, the main difference between a switch and a checkbox is that the checkbox is for status and the switch is for action.<br><br>In the example below, the use of a switch is more clear than the use of a checkbox to turn the WiFi on.</blockquote>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <div>WiFi</div>
            <label class="switch switch--small">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">On</span>
                <span class="base-margin-left">
                    <span class="icon-arrow-left-tail half-margin-right"></span>
                    <span>More clear</span>
                </span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <label class="checkbox">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                <span class="checkbox__label">WiFi On</span>
                <span class="text-danger base-margin-left">
                    <span class="icon-arrow-left-tail half-margin-right"></span>
                    <span>Less clear</span>
                </span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

divider

Thickness

Default
Thick
Thicker
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel">
    <h6>Default</h6>
    <div class="divider"></div>
    <h6>Thick</h6>
    <div class="divider divider--thick"></div>
    <h6>Thicker</h6>
    <div class="divider divider--thicker"></div>
</div>

Regular (default)

Loose

        <div><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <p>Regular (default)</p>
        <div><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div>
        <div class="divider divider--regular"></div>
        <div><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div>
        <div class="divider divider--regular"></div>
        <div><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <p>Loose</p>
        <div><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div>
        <div class="divider divider--loose"></div>

Examples

Cisco Aironet 1540 Series

Cisco WAP571E Premium Dual Radio Outdoor Access Point

Don't let outdoor challenges inhibit your wireless connectivity. The Cisco WAP571E access point is purpose-built to meet the demands of your outdoor spaces. It offers a rugged housing (IP66 rated), and works even in rain, snow, and extreme high and low temperatures.


THE NETWORK. INTUITIVE.

Powered by intent. Informed by context. Growing more intuitive every day.

View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel panel--bordered panel--loose">
    <h2>Cisco Aironet 1540 Series</h2>
    <div class="divider divider--accent-success"></div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-3">
            <img src="public/img/wireless-1.jpg">
        </div>
        <div class="col-lg-9">
            <h4> Cisco WAP571E Premium Dual Radio Outdoor Access Point</h4>
            <p>Don't let outdoor challenges inhibit your wireless connectivity. The Cisco WAP571E access point is purpose-built to meet the demands of your outdoor spaces. It offers a rugged housing (IP66 rated), and works even in rain, snow, and extreme high and low temperatures.</p>
            <div class="section">
                <button class="btn btn--secondary">Learn More</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <h6>Powered by intent. Informed by context. Growing more intuitive every day.</h6><br>

    <div class="panel panel--bordered-right panel--bordered-bottom panel--compressed" href="#base-icons-icon-aci">
        <div class="flex-center-vertical">
            <div class="flex-center" style="width:48px;height:48px" data-balloon="icon-aci" data-balloon-pos="up" data-balloon-length="medium">

    <div class="panel panel--bordered-right panel--bordered-bottom panel--compressed" href="#base-icons-icon-voicemail">

input

Size

View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-default" type="text">
                <label for="input-size-default">Default</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group input--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-compressed" type="text">
                <label for="input-size-compressed">Compressed</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Types

View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-email" type="email" value="dadams@cisco.com">
                <label for="input-type-email">Email</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-number" type="number" value="42">
                <label for="input-type-number">Number</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-password" type="password" value="hitchhiker">
                <label for="input-type-password">Password</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-telephone" type="tel" value="8675309">
                <label for="input-type-telephone">Telephone</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-url" type="url" value="http://www.cisco.com">
                <label for="input-type-url">URL</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-date" type="date">
                <label for="input-type-date">Date</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-time" type="time">
                <label for="input-type-time">Time</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group input--icon half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-type-search" type="search" value="Douglas Adams">
                <label for="input-type-search">Search</label>
                <button type="button" class="link">
                    <span class="icon-search"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group half-margin-bottom">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <select id="input-type-select">
                    <option value="first">First Value</option>
                    <option value="second" selected="">Second Value</option>
                    <option value="third">Third Value</option>
                </select>
                <label for="input-type-select">Basic Select</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

States

We are introducing a new form group modifier to style inputs in a more simplified and flexible manner. Use form-group--error to indicate validation failure.
In this release we no longer automatically add the asterisk ('*') for required fields. Use the example below to see how to manually denote a required field.
Invalid or unknown string
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-state-default" type="text">
                <label for="input-state-default">Default</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-state-disabled" type="text" disabled>
                <label for="input-state-disabled">Disabled</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-state-readonly" type="text" readonly>
                <label for="input-state-readonly">Readonly</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-state-required" type="text" required>
                <label for="input-state-required">
                    <span>Required</span>
                    <span title="this is a required field">*</span>
                </label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-state-hover" class="hover" type="text" required>
                <label for="input-state-hover">Hover</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-state-focus" class="focus" type="text" required>
                <label for="input-state-focus">Focus</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group form-group--error">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-state-error" type="text" value="(*#&$*(H*(H@#($*">
                <label for="input-state-error">Error</label>
            </div>
            <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                <span>Invalid or unknown string</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Icons

Add an icon to any input field. See examples below.
Invalid email address
Invalid email address
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group label--floated input--icon">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input type="search" required>
                <label>Search Inventory</label>
                <button type="button" class="link" tabindex="-1">
                    <span class="icon-search"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group label--floated input--icon">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input required>
                <label>Enter Date</label>
                <button type="button" class="link" tabindex="-1">
                    <span class="icon-month"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group label--floated input--icon">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input required></input>
                <label>Add Tag</label>
                <button type="button" class="link" tabindex="-1">
                    <span class="icon-tags"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group form-group--error label--floated input--icon">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input value="douglasadams@hhguide" required></input>
                <label>Enter Email</label>
                <button type="button" class="link">
                    <span class="icon-email"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
            <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert" tabindex="-1">
                <span>Invalid email address</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group input--icon input--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input type="search" required>
                <label>Search Inventory</label>
                <button type="button" class="link" tabindex="-1">
                    <span class="icon-search"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group input--icon input--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input required>
                <label>Enter Date</label>
                <button type="button" class="link" tabindex="-1">
                    <span class="icon-month"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group input--icon input--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input required></input>
                <label>Add Tag</label>
                <button type="button" class="link" tabindex="-1">
                    <span class="icon-tags"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group form-group--error input--icon input--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input value="douglasadams@hhguide" required></input>
                <label>Enter Email</label>
                <button type="button" class="link">
                    <span class="icon-email"></span>
                </button>
            </div>
            <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert" tabindex="-1">
                <span>Invalid email address</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Label Layout

Do not mix different label layouts in a single form.
Default
This field contains an error
This field contains an error
Floated
This field contains an error
This field contains an error
Inline
This field contains an error
This field contains an error
View code
Copy code 
<div class="section">
    <div class="subheader">Default</div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <input id="input-layout-default" type="text">
                    <label for="input-layout-default">Input Label</label>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group form-group--error">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <input id="input-layout-invalid" type="text">
                    <label for="input-layout-invalid">Input Label</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                    <span>This field contains an error</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <textarea id="input-layout-default-textarea" class="textarea" rows="5"></textarea>
                    <label for="input-layout-default-textarea">Textarea Label</label>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group form-group--error">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <textarea id="input-layout-default-invalid-textarea" class="textarea" rows="5"></textarea>
                    <label for="input-layout-default-invalid-textarea">Textarea Label</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                    <span>This field contains an error</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="section">
    <div class="subheader">Floated</div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group label--floated">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <input id="input-layout-floated" type="text" required>
                    <label for="input-layout-floated">Input Label</label>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group form-group--error label--floated">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <input id="input-layout-floated-invalid" type="text" required>
                    <label for="input-layout-floated-invalid">Input Label</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                    <span>This field contains an error</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group label--floated">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <textarea id="input-layout-floated-textarea" class="textarea" rows="5" required></textarea>
                    <label for="input-layout-floated-textarea">Textarea Label</label>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group form-group--error label--floated">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <textarea id="input-layout-floated-invalid-textarea" class="textarea" rows="5" required></textarea>
                    <label for="input-layout-floated-invalid-textarea">Textarea Label</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                    <span>This field contains an error</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="section">
    <div class="subheader">Inline</div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group label--inline">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <input id="input-layout-inline" type="text">
                    <label for="input-layout-inline">Input Label</label>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group form-group--error label--inline">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <input id="input-layout-inline-invalid" type="text">
                    <label for="input-layout-inline-invalid">Input Label</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                    <span>This field contains an error</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group label--inline">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <textarea id="input-layout-inline-textarea" class="textarea" rows="5"></textarea>
                    <label for="input-layout-inline-textarea">Textarea Label</label>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group form-group--error label--inline">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <textarea id="input-layout-inline-invalid-textarea" class="textarea" rows="5"></textarea>
                    <label for="input-layout-inline-invalid-textarea">Textarea Label</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                    <span>This field contains an error</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Spacing

Wrap your input elements in a form-group to control spacing. This applies to both inline and stacked input elements.
Inline Compressed
Inline Regular (default)
Inline Loose
Inline None
Compressed
Default
Loose
None
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Inline Compressed</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-compressed-one" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-compressed-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-compressed-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-compressed-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-compressed-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-compressed-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Inline Regular (default)</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-default-one" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-default-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-default-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-default-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-default-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-default-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6 base-margin-top">
        <div class="subheader">Inline Loose</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--loose">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-loose-one" id="inputtype="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-loose-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--loose">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-loose-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-loose-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--loose">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-loose-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-loose-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6 base-margin-top">
        <div class="subheader">Inline None</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--nospacing">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-none-one" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-none-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--nospacing">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-none-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-none-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--nospacing">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-inline-none-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-inline-none-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="divider divider--loose"></div>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Compressed</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-compressed-one" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-compressed-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-compressed-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-compressed-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-compressed-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-compressed-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Default</div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-default-one" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-default-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-default-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-default-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-default-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-default-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Loose</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-loose-one" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-loose-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-loose-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-loose-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-loose-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-loose-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">None</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-none-one" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-none-one">One</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-none-two" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-none-two">Two</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-spacing-none-three" type="text">
                <label for="input-spacing-none-three">Three</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Hint Text

Use hint text to provide a description of what the input field should contain.
partner initiated customer access identifier
Product security incident response team description
View code
Copy code 
<div class="section">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-md-3">
            <div class="form-group">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <input id="input-hint-default" type="text">
                    <label for="input-hint-default">PICA ID</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-muted">
                    <span>partner initiated customer access identifier</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-6">
            <div class="form-group">
                <div class="form-group__text">
                    <textarea id="input-hint-textarea" class="textarea" rows="5"></textarea>
                    <label for="input-hint-textarea">PSIRT Description</label>
                </div>
                <div class="help-block text-muted" role="alert">
                    <span>Product security incident response team description</span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Text Areas

Invalid or unknown string
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <textarea id="input-textarea-single" rows="1"></textarea>
                <label for="input-textarea-single">Textarea (single row)</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <textarea id="input-textarea-multiple" class="textarea" rows="5"></textarea>
                <label for="input-textarea-multiple">Textarea (multiple rows)</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <textarea id="input-textarea-disabled" rows="5" disabled></textarea>
                <label for="input-textarea-disabled">Textarea (disabled)</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <textarea id="input-textarea-readonly" rows="5" readonly></textarea>
                <label for="input-textarea-readonly">Textarea (readonly)</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <textarea id="input-textarea-well" class="textarea textarea--well" rows="5"></textarea>
                <label for="input-textarea-well">Textarea with a well</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="form-group form-group--error">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <textarea id="input-textarea-invalid" class="textarea" rows="5">&^$%^$&*^*&</textarea>
                <label for="input-textarea-invalid">Textarea Invalid</label>
            </div>
            <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                <span>Invalid or unknown string</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Examples

You can use col-* classes to align your labels in stacked form groups. See the examples below.
Inline Labels (left)
Inline Labels (right)
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Inline Labels (left)</div>
        <div class="form-group label--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-default" type="text">
                <label class="col-3" for="input-size-default">Lorem</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group label--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-default" type="text">
                <label class="col-3" for="input-size-default">Lorem Ipsum</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group label--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-default" type="text">
                <label class="col-3" for="input-size-default">Dolor</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Inline Labels (right)</div>
        <div class="form-group label--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-default" type="text">
                <label class="col-3 text-right" for="input-size-default">Lorem</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group label--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-default" type="text">
                <label class="col-3 text-right" for="input-size-default">Lorem Ipsum</label>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group label--inline">
            <div class="form-group__text">
                <input id="input-size-default" type="text">
                <label class="col-3 text-right" for="input-size-default">Dolor</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

label

Size

tiny small default large
View code
Copy code 
<span class="label label--tiny">tiny</span>
<span class="label label--small">small</span>
<span class="label">default</span>
<span class="label label--large">large</span>

Color

info success warning warning-alt danger default blue dark gray vibrant blue indigo
light gray white ghost
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel panel--compressed">
    <span class="label label--info">info</span>
    <span class="label label--success">success</span>
    <span class="label label--warning">warning</span>
    <span class="label label--warning-alt">warning-alt</span>
    <span class="label label--danger">danger</span>
    <span class="label">default</span>
    <span class="label label--blue">blue</span>
    <span class="label label--dkgray">dark gray</span>
    <span class="label label--vibblue">vibrant blue</span>
    <span class="label label--indigo">indigo</span>
</div>
<div class="panel panel--dkgray panel--compressed base-margin-top col-4">
    <span class="label label--ltgray">light gray</span>
    <span class="label label--white">white</span>
    <span class="label label--ghost">ghost</span>
</div>

Raised

info success warning danger
View code
Copy code 
<span class="label label--info label--raised">
    <span>info</span>
</span>
<span class="label label--success label--raised">
    <span>success</span>
</span>
<span class="label label--warning label--raised">
    <span>warning</span>
</span>
<span class="label label--danger label--raised">
    <span>danger</span>
</span>

Removable

info success warning danger
View code
Copy code 
<span class="label label--info">
    <span>info</span>
    <span class="icon-close"></span>
</span>
<span class="label label--success">
    <span>success</span>
    <span class="icon-close"></span>
</span>
<span class="label label--warning">
    <span>warning</span>
    <span class="icon-close"></span>
</span>
<span class="label label--danger">
    <span>danger</span>
    <span class="icon-close"></span>
</span>

Outlined

info success warning warning-alt danger default blue dark gray vibrant blue indigo
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel panel--compressed">
    <span class="label label--info label--outlined">info</span>
    <span class="label label--success label--outlined">success</span>
    <span class="label label--warning label--outlined">warning</span>
    <span class="label label--warning-alt label--outlined">warning-alt</span>
    <span class="label label--danger label--outlined">danger</span>
    <span class="label label--outlined">default</span>
    <span class="label label--blue label--outlined">blue</span>
    <span class="label label--dkgray label--outlined">dark gray</span>
    <span class="label label--vibblue label--outlined">vibrant blue</span>
    <span class="label label--indigo label--outlined">indigo</span>
</div>

1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 0

    <span class="label label--circle label--ltgray">3</span>
    <span class="label label--circle label--mdgray">4</span>
    <span class="label label--circle label--dkgray">5</span>
    <span class="label label--circle label--dkblue">6</span>

    <span class="label label--circle label--success">8</span>
    <span class="label label--circle label--warning">9</span>
    <span class="label label--circle label--danger">0</span>
