list

Spacing / Vertical

Spacing between elements in a list can be specified using the modifiers shown below. This is useful when you need to manage spacing (margins) between your components.

Spacing (default)

Compressed

Regular

Loose

View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <p>Spacing (default)</p>
        <ul class="list">
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <p>Compressed</p>
        <ul class="list list--compressed">
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <p>Regular</p>
        <ul class="list list--regular">
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <p>Loose</p>
        <ul class="list list--loose">
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
            <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

Spacing / Horizontal

By default, lists are vertically-stacked. Add the class modifier list--inline to render list elements as an inline list.

Spacing (default)


Compressed


Regular


Loose

View code
Copy code 
<p>Spacing (default)</p>
<ul class="list list--inline">
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
</ul>
<br>
<p>Compressed</p>
<ul class="list list--inline list--compressed">
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
</ul>
<br>
<p>Regular</p>
<ul class="list list--inline list--regular">
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
</ul>
<br>
<p>Loose</p>
<ul class="list list--inline list--loose">
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered"><img src="public/img/short-paragraph.png"></div></li>
</ul>

Highlighting

Add the class modifier list--highlight to add a hover effect to each element in the list.
  • One
  • Two
  • Three
View code
Copy code 
<ul class="list list--highlight">
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered">One</div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered">Two</div></li>
    <li><div class="panel panel--bordered">Three</div></li>
</ul>

Ordered List

  1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
  2. Maecenas facilisis quam eget pellentesque efficitur.
    1. Vivamus condimentum nunc sit amet lorem dapibus, quis scelerisque erat finibus.
    2. Sed dapibus ex ut tortor suscipit, sed tristique sapien luctus.
      1. Aliquam vitae turpis porta, bibendum leo non, aliquet velit.
      2. Proin tempor ligula ut fermentum faucibus.
  3. Mauris consequat metus at magna tincidunt faucibus.
View code
Copy code 
<ol>
    <li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</li>
    <li>Maecenas facilisis quam eget pellentesque efficitur.
        <ol>
            <li>Vivamus condimentum nunc sit amet lorem dapibus, quis scelerisque erat finibus.</li>
            <li>Sed dapibus ex ut tortor suscipit, sed tristique sapien luctus.
                <ol>
                    <li>Aliquam vitae turpis porta, bibendum leo non, aliquet velit.</li>
                    <li>Proin tempor ligula ut fermentum faucibus.</li>
                </ol>
            </li>
         </ol>
    </li>
    <li>Mauris consequat metus at magna tincidunt faucibus.</li>
</ol>

Unordered List

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
  • Maecenas facilisis quam eget pellentesque efficitur.
    • Vivamus condimentum nunc sit amet lorem dapibus, quis scelerisque erat finibus.
    • Sed dapibus ex ut tortor suscipit, sed tristique sapien luctus.
      • Aliquam vitae turpis porta, bibendum leo non, aliquet velit.
      • Proin tempor ligula ut fermentum faucibus.
  • Mauris consequat metus at magna tincidunt faucibus.
View code
Copy code 
<ul>
    <li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</li>
    <li>Maecenas facilisis quam eget pellentesque efficitur.
        <ul>
            <li>Vivamus condimentum nunc sit amet lorem dapibus, quis scelerisque erat finibus.</li>
            <li>Sed dapibus ex ut tortor suscipit, sed tristique sapien luctus.
                <ul>
                    <li>Aliquam vitae turpis porta, bibendum leo non, aliquet velit.</li>
                    <li>Proin tempor ligula ut fermentum faucibus.</li>
                </ul>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>Mauris consequat metus at magna tincidunt faucibus.</li>
</ul>

Unstyled List

  • Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
  • Maecenas facilisis quam eget pellentesque efficitur.
    • Vivamus condimentum nunc sit amet lorem dapibus, quis scelerisque erat finibus.
    • Sed dapibus ex ut tortor suscipit, sed tristique sapien luctus.
      • Aliquam vitae turpis porta, bibendum leo non, aliquet velit.
      • Proin tempor ligula ut fermentum faucibus.
  • Mauris consequat metus at magna tincidunt faucibus.
View code
Copy code 
<ul class="list--unstyled">
    <li>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</li>
    <li>Maecenas facilisis quam eget pellentesque efficitur.
        <ul>
            <li>Vivamus condimentum nunc sit amet lorem dapibus, quis scelerisque erat finibus.</li>
            <li>Sed dapibus ex ut tortor suscipit, sed tristique sapien luctus.
                <ul>
                    <li>Aliquam vitae turpis porta, bibendum leo non, aliquet velit.</li>
                    <li>Proin tempor ligula ut fermentum faucibus.</li>
                </ul>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </li>
    <li>Mauris consequat metus at magna tincidunt faucibus.</li>
</ul>

panel

Color

Default link
Light Blue link
Light Gray link
Medium Gray link
Dark Gray link
Blue link
Vibrant Blue link
Indigo link
Success link
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row no-gutters">
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--loose panel--bordered">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Default</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--ltblue panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Light Blue</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--ltgray panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Light Gray</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--mdgray panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Medium Gray</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--dkgray panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Dark Gray</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--blue panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Blue</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--vibblue panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Vibrant Blue</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--indigo panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Indigo</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-4">
        <div class="panel panel--success panel--loose">
            <span class="text-uppercase">Success</span>
            <a href="javascript:;">link</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Spacing

See @List pattern for how to manage panel spacing.

Raised

Flat (default)
Raised (small)
Raised (medium)
Raised (large)
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="panel panel--blue">
            <div>Flat (default)</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered panel--raised-small">
            <div>Raised (small)</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered panel--raised">
            <div>Raised (medium)</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered panel--raised-large">
            <div>Raised (large)</div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Bordered Top
Bordered Right
Bordered Bottom
Bordered Left

    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered">
            <div>Bordered</div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<br>
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered-top">
            <div>Bordered Top</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered-right">
            <div>Bordered Right</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered-bottom">
            <div>Bordered Bottom</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="panel panel--bordered-left">
            <div>Bordered Left</div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

View code

<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="panel panel--ltgray panel--well">
            <div>Well</div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

radio

Sketch

States

 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel">
    <div class="container-fluid">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Normal</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Hover</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Pressed</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Focus</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Disabled</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">ON</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="active hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="focus">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
           </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio disabled">
                <input type="radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="active hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="focus">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio disabled">
                <input type="radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

Layout

Radio elements are stacked by default. Add the form group modifier form-group--inline to align them horizontally.
Stacked (default)
Inline
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Stacked (default)</div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
               <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Inline</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Spacing

Wrap your radio elements in a form-group to control spacing. This applies to both inline and stacked switch elements.
Compressed
Regular (default)
Loose
None
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row no-gutters">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Compressed</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-compressed-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-compressed-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--compressed">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-compressed-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <hr>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-compressed-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-compressed-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-compressed-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Regular (default)</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-regular-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-regular-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-regular-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <hr>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-regular-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-regular-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-regular-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Loose</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--loose">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-loose-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--loose">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-loose-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--loose">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-loose-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <hr>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-loose-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-loose-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-loose-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">None</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-none-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-none-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="inline-none-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <hr>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-none-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-none-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="stacked-none-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Allowed Backgrounds

Checkboxes are only allowed on the following panels.
WHITE
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
LIGHT GRAY
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
DARK GRAY
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
INDIGO
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
GREEN
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
BLUE
 
Normal
Hover
Pressed
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel panel--loose">
    <div class="container-fluid">
    <h6>WHITE</h6>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Normal</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Hover</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Pressed</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Focus</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Disabled</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">ON</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="active hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="focus">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
           </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio disabled">
                <input type="radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="active hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="focus">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio disabled">
                <input type="radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

    <div class="container-fluid">
    <h6>GREEN</h6>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>

        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Pressed</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Focus</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Disabled</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">ON</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="active hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" checked class="focus">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
           </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio disabled">
                <input type="radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="active hover">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">

                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>

                <input type="radio">

    </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="panel panel--loose panel--blue">
    <div class="container-fluid">
    <h6>BLUE</h6>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">

            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" class="focus">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="radio disabled">
                <input type="radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

Examples

Option Ordering

You should list the options in a logical order, such as most likely to be selected to least, simplest operation to most complex, or least risk to most. Alphabetical ordering is not recommended because it is language dependent and therefore not localizable.

Also make sure to offer a default selection. Radio buttons should always have one option pre-selected.

Dynamic Channel Assignment

View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <h2 class="section">Option Ordering</h2>
        <blockquote>You should list the options in a logical order, such as most likely to be selected to least, simplest operation to most complex, or least risk to most. Alphabetical ordering is not recommended because it is language dependent and therefore not localizable.<br><br>Also make sure to offer a default selection. Radio buttons should always have one option pre-selected.</blockquote>
        <p class="text-bold">Dynamic Channel Assignment</p>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="example-ordering-radio" checked>
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">Best</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="example-ordering-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">20 MHz</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="example-ordering-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">40 MHz</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="example-ordering-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">80 MHz</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="radio">
                <input type="radio" name="example-ordering-radio">
                <span class="radio__input"></span>
                <span class="radio__label">160 MHz</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

select

Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
Option 1 Option 2 Option 3

Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-size-default" value="Select an Option">
                <label for="select-size-default">Default</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown input--compressed">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-size-compressed" value="Select an Option">
                <label for="select-size-compressed">Compressed</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Types

Option 1 Option 2 Option 3
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <select id="select-type-basic">
                    <option value="first">First Value</option>
                    <option value="second" selected="">Second Value</option>
                    <option value="third">Third Value</option>
                </select>
                <label for="select-type-basic">Unstyled</label>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-type-styled" value="Select an Option">
                <label for="select-type-styled">Styled</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Please select an option

Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-state-default" value="Select an Option">
                <label for="select-state-default">Default</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-state-disabled" value="Select an Option" disabled>
                <label for="select-state-disabled">Disabled</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-state-readonly" value="Select an Option" readonly>
                <label for="select-state-readonly">Readonly</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-state-required" value="Select an Option" required>
                <label for="select-state-required">
                    <span>Required</span>
                    <span title="this is a required field">*</span>
                </label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-state-hover" value="Select an Option" class="hover">
                <label for="select-state-hover">Hover</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-state-focus" value="Select an Option" class="focus">
                <label for="select-state-focus">Focus</label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="form-group dropdown form-group--error">
            <div class="form-group__text select">
                <input id="select-state-error" value="Select an Option">
                <label for="select-state-error">
                    <span>Error</span>
                    <span title="this is a required field">*</span>
                </label>
            </div>
            <div class="dropdown__menu">
                <a>Option 1</a>
                <a>Option 2</a>
                <a>Option 3</a>
            </div>
            <div class="help-block text-danger" role="alert">
                <span>Please select an option</span>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

switch

Sketch

States

 
Normal
Hover
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel">
    <div class="container-fluid">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Normal</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Hover</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Focus</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Disabled</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">ON</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch hover">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="focus">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch disabled">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch hover">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" class="focus">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch disabled">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

Size

View code
Copy code 
<div class="form-group">
    <label class="switch">
        <input type="checkbox" checked>
        <span class="switch__input"></span>
        <span class="switch__label">Default</span>
    </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group">
    <label class="switch switch--large">
        <input type="checkbox" checked>
        <span class="switch__input"></span>
        <span class="switch__label">Large</span>
    </label>
</div>

Layout

Switch elements are stacked by default. Add the form modifier form-group--inline to inline them.
Stacked (default)
Inline
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row">
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Stacked (default)</div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-6">
        <div class="subheader">Inline</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--inline">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Labels

Switch Labels can be placed left, right, or on both sides of the switch element.
View code
Copy code 
<div class="form-group form-group--stacked">
    <label class="switch">
        <input type="checkbox" checked>
        <span class="switch__label">Left</span>
        <span class="switch__input"></span>
    </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group form-group--stacked">
    <label class="switch">
        <input type="checkbox" checked>
        <span class="switch__input"></span>
        <span class="switch__label">Right</span>
    </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group form-group--stacked">
    <label class="switch">
        <input type="checkbox" checked>
        <span class="switch__label">Both</span>
        <span class="switch__input"></span>
        <span class="switch__label">Both</span>
    </label>
</div>

Icons

Due to the new switch style, we were unable to embed icons into the actual switch like the previous version. Instead, we hide the actual switch and only render the icons.
View code
Copy code 
<div class="form-group form-group--stacked">
    <label class="switch-icon">
        <input type="checkbox" checked>
        <span class="switch__input">
            <span class="icon-grid-view"></span>
            <span class="icon-list-view"></span>
        </span>
    </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group form-group--stacked">
    <label class="switch-icon">
        <input type="checkbox">
        <span class="switch__input">
            <span class="icon-eye"></span>
            <span class="icon-eye-closed"></span>
        </span>
    </label>
</div>
<div class="form-group form-group--stacked">
    <label class="switch-icon switch-icon--large">
        <input type="checkbox">
        <span class="switch__input">
            <span class="icon-grid-view"></span>
            <span class="icon-list-view"></span>
        </span>
    </label>
</div>

Spacing

Wrap your switch elements in a form-group to control spacing between other form group elements. This applies to both inline and stacked switch elements.
Compressed
Regular (default)
Loose
None
View code
Copy code 
<div class="row no-gutters">
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Compressed</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--compressed">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Regular (default)</div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">Loose</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--loose">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="col-md-3">
        <div class="subheader">None</div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">One</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Two</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="form-group form-group--nospacing">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label">Three</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

Allowed Backgrounds

Switches are only allowed on the following panels.
WHITE
 
Normal
Hover
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
LIGHT GRAY
 
Normal
Hover
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
DARK GRAY
 
Normal
Hover
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
INDIGO
 
Normal
Hover
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
GREEN
 
Normal
Hover
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
BLUE
 
Normal
Hover
Focus
Disabled
ON
OFF
View code
Copy code 
<div class="panel panel--loose">
    <div class="container-fluid">
    <h6>WHITE</h6>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div>&nbsp;</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Normal</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Hover</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Focus</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="subheader">Disabled</div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row half-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">ON</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch hover">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" checked class="focus">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch disabled">
                <input type="checkbox" checked>
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row base-margin-bottom">
        <div class="col-2">
            <div class="text-right">OFF</div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch hover">
                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">
            <label class="switch">
                <input type="checkbox" class="focus">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>
            </label>
        </div>
        <div class="col-2">

                <input type="checkbox">
                <span class="switch__input"></span>
                <span class="switch__label hidden-xs">Label</span>

        </div>
    </div>
    </div>
</div>

            </label>

</div>

table

Borders

Add the class table--bordered to add borders to your cells, rows and table.

No Borders (default)

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 Row 1, Column 2 Row 1, Column 3
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3

With Borders

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 Row 1, Column 2 Row 1, Column 3
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3
View code
Copy code 
<div class="responsive-table">
    <h4 class="section">No Borders (default)</h4>
    <table class="table">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>
<div class="responsive-table">
    <h4 class="section">With Borders</h4>
    <table class="table table--bordered table--selectable">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

Striping

By default all rows are striped for better visibility. Add the class table--nostripes to remove row striping.

With Striping (default)

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 link Row 1, Column 2 link Row 1, Column 3 link
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3

No Striping

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 link Row 1, Column 2 link Row 1, Column 3 link
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3
View code
Copy code 
<div class="responsive-table">
    <h4 class="section">With Striping (default)</h4>
    <table class="table">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>
<div class="responsive-table">
    <h4 class="section">No Striping</h4>
    <table class="table table--nostripes">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

Selection

Add the class table--selectable to enable row selection. Add the class active to the selected row.
Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 link Row 1, Column 2 link Row 1, Column 3 link
ACTIVE Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3
View code
Copy code 
<div class="responsive-table">
    <table class="table table--selectable">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th class="sortable">Header 1 <span class="sort-indicator icon-chevron-down"></span></th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
            </tr>
            <tr class="active">
                <td>ACTIVE</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

Highlighting

Add the class table--highlight to add a row hover effect. You can also add the class sortable to a column header to indicate active sort.
Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 link Row 1, Column 2 link Row 1, Column 3 link
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3
View code
Copy code 
<div class="responsive-table">
    <table class="table table--highlight">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox"/>
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </th>
                <th class="sortable">Header 1 <span class="sort-indicator icon-chevron-down"></span></th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox"/>
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3 <a href="javascript:;">link</a></td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox">
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox"/>
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

Hover

Add the class table--hover to add a simple row hover effect.
Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 Row 1, Column 2 Row 1, Column 3
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3
View code
Copy code 
<div class="responsive-table">
    <table class="table table--hover">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox"/>
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </th>
                <th class="sortable">Header 1 <span class="sort-indicator icon-chevron-down"></span></th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox"/>
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox">
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>
                    <label class="checkbox">
                        <input type="checkbox"/>
                        <span class="checkbox__input"></span>
                    </label>
                </td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>

Fixed

Add the class table--fixed to change the table layout to fixed. A fixed table layout renders quicker than non-fixed but column widths are not determined by the data. By default tables are NOT fixed.
Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis mattis dui. Phasellus at sagittis nulla. <div class="responsive-table">
    <table class="table table--fixed">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.</td>
                <td>Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Etiam quis mattis dui. Phasellus at sagittis nulla. Cras fermentum eu ligula vitae posuere. Nullam ut elit vel quam finibus mattis.</td>

Wrapped Text

Add the class table--wrap to wrap text in the cells. By default, text is not wrapped.
Header 1 Header 2 Header 3

Padding

Compressed

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 Row 1, Column 2 Row 1, Column 3
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3

Regular (default)

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 Row 1, Column 2 Row 1, Column 3
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3

Loose

Header 1 Header 2 Header 3
Row 1, Column 1 Row 1, Column 2 Row 1, Column 3
Row 2, Column 1 Row 2, Column 2 Row 2, Column 3
Row 3, Column 1 Row 3, Column 2 Row 3, Column 3
View code
Copy code 
<div class="responsive-table">
    <h4 class="section">Compressed</h4>
    <table class="table table--compressed">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>
<div class="responsive-table">
    <h4 class="section">Regular (default)</h4>
    <table class="table">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>
<div class="responsive-table">
    <h4 class="section">Loose</h4>
    <table class="table table--loose">
        <thead>
            <tr>
                <th>Header 1</th>
                <th>Header 2</th>
                <th>Header 3</th>
            </tr>
        </thead>
        <tbody>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 1, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 1, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 2, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 2, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
            <tr>
                <td>Row 3, Column 1</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 2</td>
                <td>Row 3, Column 3</td>
            </tr>
        </tbody>
    </table>
</div>
